ygData.subject: RE: RE:Twinking please stop this discussiion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Here, here. I m beginning to think the people involved in this useless discussion are all insisting on having the last word.  Somebody posts so the others
ygData.messageBody:
> For those of you that don't recieve these messages in digest, the unwanted
> threads are easy to delete. The rest of us who use digest have to scroll
> down through every single message, and the twinking thread is beating us
> to
> death. PLEASE STOP THE THREAD!
>
Here, here. I'm beginning to think the people involved in this useless
discussion are all insisting on having the last word. Somebody posts so the
others all have to respond. Wash, rinse, and repeat. Of course, they have
to quote the previous threads so the whole thing turns into a behemoth. I
had to give up reading the digest version for both this list and the brewers
list. Too many inconsiderate posters who had to no idea on how to cut and
paste their replies.

Galtin of E'ci
